commit.message:
convert.c (convert_to_integer): Convert (int)logb() into ilogb().

	* convert.c (convert_to_integer): Convert (int)logb() into ilogb().

testsuite/ChangeLog:

	* gcc.dg/builtins-65.c: New test.
